title: 204 9 "The Gold and Waver Recovery Operations!"Transliteration: "Ōgon Dakkan Sakusen to Ueibā Kaishū Sakusen!" (Japanese:黄金奪還作戦とウエイバー回収作戦!) Katsumi Tokoro Hirohiko Kamisaka October 3, 2004(2004-10-03) —
